title: Industry Site Visit
description: An exclusive site visit to a leading chemical, biopharmaceutical, or semiconductor plant to see engineering principles in action.
details: This is a prime opportunity to bridge the gap between theory and practice. Through our faculty and AIChE Singapore contacts, we will be organizing a site visit to a major industrial facility. This will allow members to see large-scale unit operations, learn about process safety and control from industry professionals, and understand the day-to-day work of a chemical engineer. Details on the specific plant will be confirmed closer to the date.
